last_episode_to_air.name: Loli
last_episode_to_air.overview: More than 20 years after Rocío’s murder, Dolores and Alicia struggle to put their trauma behind them.

name: Dolores: The Truth About the Wanninkhof Case
original_name: Dolores: La verdad sobre el caso Wanninkhof
overview: Twenty years after being wrongly convicted for murder, Dolores Vázquez shares her candid account of the infamous Rocío Wanninkhof case – one of the biggest miscarriages of justice in Spain’s recent history.

episodes.name: Rocío
episodes.overview: 1999, Mijas, Spain. When 19-year-old Rocío Wanninkhof is found brutally murdered, the civil guard narrows in on a prime suspect close to the victim’s mother Alicia: Dolores Vázquez.

episodes.name: Dolores
episodes.overview: Despite a lack of physical evidence, Dolores is arrested for Rocío’s murder. With public opinion increasingly turned against her after the media publicizes her bygone romance with Alicia, Dolores’ mental health begins to deteriorate.

episodes.name: Alicia
episodes.overview: As the media frenzy surrounding Dolores’ trial intensifies, the prosecution presents a case built on conjecture to an already biased jury.

episodes.name: Sonia
episodes.overview: Dolores is found guilty and sent back to prison – but six months later, her case is overturned. As she awaits a retrial, another young woman disappears on the Costa del Sol.

episodes.name: Tony
episodes.overview: As similarities are drawn between Sonia and Rocío’s cases, Tony King – an Englishman with a record of violence against woman – is arrested and linked to both murders.

episodes.name: Loli
episodes.overview: More than 20 years after Rocío’s murder, Dolores and Alicia struggle to put their trauma behind them.
